---
title: "Submit new studies or modifications"
editor: source
---

Please contact us to add new studies or to suggest modifications.

Email [benzipperer@gmail.com](mailto:benzipperer@gmail.com?subject=Own-wage elasticity repository) for private correspondence, or you can publicly file an issue at the underlying [Github repository](https://github.com/Economic/owe/issues).

We welcome your feedback if we have inadvertently omitted a study or failed to select the best estimate from a given paper. The repository is a living document that we will regularly update.
